rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Lobby
rooms.description: A welcoming area with storage, shoe cabinet and sitting space. Designed to balance entry energy per Vastu.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living room with large windows oriented towards the courtyard and east for sunlight. Decorated to enhance social interaction.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: A comfortable dining room with a view of the courtyard, promoting positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen layout with modern amenities. Placed on the southeast for auspicious energies.

rooms.name: Courtyard
rooms.description: Open courtyard at the center promoting natural light and ventilation. Includes a water feature and greenery.

rooms.name: Guest Room 1
rooms.description: Quiet guest room with access to courtyard view.

rooms.name: Bathroom 1
rooms.description: Functional bathroom for guest and family convenience.
